plot: A small Kansas town has turned into a killing ground.Is it a serial killer, a man with the need to destroy?Or is it a darker force, a curse upon the land?Amid golden cornfields, FBI Special Agent Pendergast discovers evil in the blood of America's heartland.No one is safe.
characters: Aloysius X.L. Pendergast, Corrie Swanson, Sheriff Dent Hazen, Tad Franklin, Winifred Kraus, Smit Ludwig, Bushy Jim Draper, Art Ridder, Dr. Stanton Chauncy, Lonny Gasparilla
